title: Justifying faith: or, That faith by which the just do live briefly describ'd in a discourse on 1 Joh. 5.12. By the author of a late book, entitled Summum bonum, or, An explication of the divine goodness, &c. To this discourse is added, an abstract of some letters to an eminent learned person, concerning the excellency of the Book of common prayer, &c.
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for William Crook, at the sign of the Green Dragon without Temple-Bar,
